title: How to Make Indian Martinis

steps.headline: Put ice cubes along  with the remaining ingredients in a glass.
Muddle the coffee beans and one sprig of curry leaves together.
Put ice cubes along with the remaining ingredients in a glass.
Garnish with some curry leaves and coffee beans.
Mix lychee juice, apple juice, cranberry juice and sour mix in a glass.
Garnish with an apple and pineapple slices and serve!

text: Chaitini Martini Muddle (roughly crush) the mint leaves.  Put ice cubes along  with the remaining ingredients in a glass.  Shake well and double strain. Serve! Maharashtra Martini Muddle the coffee beans and one sprig of curry leaves together.  Put ice cubes along with the remaining ingredients in a glass.  Shake well and double strain.  Garnish with some curry leaves and coffee beans.  Serve!  Winkitini Mix lychee juice, apple juice, cranberry juice and sour mix in a glass.  Shake well.  Garnish with an apple and pineapple slices and serve!
